name: Dracula's Library 2
description:
Dracula has again summoned you to help with his library. This time however a host of younger vampires have their minds bent on stealing Dracula's wealth of knowledge. It is your duty to organize and protect Dracula's vast collection of books while fighting off those who wish to steal his knowledge. Use your spells to cast the symbols on the books and to repel the Dracula's enemies.

54 increasingly difficult levels.
Four symbol types that must be cast to properly organize and seal the tomes.
Simpler game play than original game but more challenging concentrationwise.
